column2: Enslave [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Turn [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into your personal property. If [Root.GetSheHe] has titles, his heir will inherit them.
Free [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will no longer be your slave and will move to the court of a member of his dynasty.
Put [Root.GetTitledFirstName] up for sale
Make it known that [Root.GetTitledFirstname] is up for sale and have you advisors value [Root.GetHerHim].
Remove from sale
Make it known that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer up for purchase.
Buy [Root.GetFirstName]
[Root.GetFirstName] might make a useful servant. We should offer to buy [Root.GetHerHim].
My captor, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to enslave me. Since I have become a slave [Root.Heir.GetFirstName] will inherit my titles.
I hope he does well in my stead
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetName] has been enslaved by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. I have taken over [From.GetHerHis] titles in [From.GetHerHis] stead.
We will get [From.GetHerHim] back someday
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetName] was freed by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHe] will be seeking refuge with one of our kinsmen,
Glory to the family!
My financial advisors have valued [target_slave.GetFullName] based on [target_slave.GetHerHis] personality and physical traits.
Let's put [target_slave.GetFullName] up for sale.
Actually, I have changed my mind. Don't put [target_slave.GetFullName] up for sale.
I have shown an interest in buying [target_slave.GetFullName].
Buy [target_slave.GetHerHim]
[target_slave.GetFirstName] isn't worth it.
